response.overview: One day, French female painter Pauline (Pu Lingnan Line Nane) walked into Danzhai, a mysterious and beautiful mountain in southeastern Guizhou, China. She suddenly fainted in a paddy field and almost lost her life. But there, two Miao children found her. The father of the child carried her back home and invited a local Miao doctor to treat her. Later, when her condition got worse, people from the whole village came to help her. She felt When the simple love of the local kind-hearted Miao people, she felt the warmth in the world.
response.title: 云上太阳
